description: While traditionally too brittle and soft to serve as any kind of armor, the Gohma developed a method that fusing Rupees with their exoskeleton that resulted in a very durable coat of protection.
tooltip: The Gohma could augment their exoskeletons with various metal forms. Such alteration helped make the arachnids all the more durable. (+5 Armor vs Hack and Pierce for all Gohma Units)
